title: Compass Navigation for Wear
summary: Simple and beautiful compass navigation on your Android Wear smartwatch.
developerAddress:
12 George Hudson Tower
28 High Street
E15 2PL London
description: It's simple: Just enter a destination on your phone. Then use your watch to navigate. A compass points to  your destination. You can enter addresses or coordinates.This app is ideal for navigation while cycling, hiking or for geo caching.NOTE: - The general accuracy depends on the sensors of the watch. - The app has different calibration features to improve the accuracy of the watch compass.  - Currently, you need your phone to enter a destination. - If your watch has a a magnetic sensor and GPS you don't need your phone to be connected to the watch while navigatingPlease contact contact@wearnavigation.com if you have any issues or questions.
descriptionHTML:
It's simple: Just enter a destination on your phone. Then use your watch to navigate.
A compass points to your destination. You can enter addresses or coordinates.

This app is ideal for navigation while cycling, hiking or for geo caching.


NOTE:

- The general accuracy depends on the sensors of the watch.

- The app has different calibration features to improve the accuracy of the watch compass.

- Currently, you need your phone to enter a destination.

- If your watch has a a magnetic sensor and GPS you don't need your phone to be connected to the watch while navigating

Please contact contact@wearnavigation.com if you have any issues or questions.
comments: Nice and simple Just show me the general direction without buzzing and talking
